entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
